title: Accident & Emergency
description: 24/7 emergency care for critical injuries and sudden medical conditions with a dedicated trauma team.

title: Anaesthesia
description: Specialized pain management and anaesthetic care during complex surgical procedures.

title: Blood Bank
description: Safe and reliable blood transfusion services with rigorous screening and 24/7 availability.

title: Cancer Care Center
description: Comprehensive oncology services including chemotherapy, radiation, and surgical oncology.

title: Cardiology
description: Advanced heart care, including diagnostics, interventional cardiology, and non-invasive treatments.

title: Cardiothoracic & Vascular Surgery
description: High-precision surgeries for the heart, lungs, and blood vessels.

title: Counselling Center
description: Psychological support and professional counselling for mental well-being and emotional health.

title: Critical Care Unit
description: Advanced life support systems and intensive monitoring for critically ill patients.

title: Dental & Maxillofacial Surgery
description: Complete oral care, dental implants, and complex surgeries for the face and jaw.

title: Dermatology & Venereology
description: Expert diagnosis and treatment for skin conditions, allergies, and venereal diseases.

title: Dietetics & Nutrition
description: Personalized diet plans and nutritional counselling for healthy living and disease management.

title: Endocrinology & Diabetology
description: Specialized care for diabetes, thyroid disorders, and other endocrine system imbalances.

title: ENT & Head Neck Surgery
description: Treatments for ear, nose, throat, and complex head and neck surgical procedures.

title: Gastroenterology & Hepatology
description: Expertise in digestive system disorders and liver-related diseases including endoscopy.

title: General & Laparoscopic Surgery
description: Minimally invasive laparoscopic surgeries and a wide range of general surgical procedures.

title: Internal Medicine
description: Comprehensive adult healthcare for chronic conditions and overall wellness.

title: Lab Medicine
description: High-precision diagnostic laboratory services for accurate disease detection.

title: Neonatology
description: Specialized care for newborn infants, particularly those who are ill or born prematurely.

title: Nephrology
description: Expert care for kidney-related diseases, hypertension, and dialysis services.

title: Neurology
description: Diagnosis and management of brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nervous system disorders.

title: Neurosurgery
description: Highly complex surgical interventions for the brain and spine.

title: Obstetrics And Gynaecology
description: Complete care for women, including prenatal care, delivery, and gynecological surgeries.

title: Ophthalmology
description: Comprehensive eye care including vision correction and advanced eye surgeries.

title: Orthopaedics & Joint Replacement
description: Bone and joint care including robotic-assisted replacements and trauma surgery.

title: Paediatrics
description: Dedicated healthcare services for infants, children, and adolescents.

title: Radiology & Imaging
description: Advanced imaging services including MRI, CT scan, and X-ray for accurate diagnosis.

title: Urology
description: Expert care for the urinary tract system and male reproductive organs.
